entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Becoming a few clouds after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 16 April 2023
